```{r}
#importing dataset

data <- read.csv("BankChurners.csv")

```

```{r}
#percentage of total customers that have attrited

data %>%
  count(Attrition_Flag) %>%
  mutate(percent = n / sum(n) * 100)

```

```{r}
#summary of attrited customers
attrited_customers <- data %>% filter(Attrition_Flag == "Attrited Customer")
existing_customers <- data %>% filter(Attrition_Flag == "Existing Customer")


summary(attrited_customers)

histogram_nummeric <- function(variable_x){
  plot <- ggplot(data, aes(x = variable_x, color = Attrition_Flag)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), fill = "white", binwidth = 1) +
  geom_density(alpha = .2) +
  labs(x = deparse(substitute(Customer_Age)))

  plot

}

histogram_nummeric(data$Customer_Age)
histogram_nummeric(data$Months_on_book)

deparse(substitute(Customer_Age))


```
